attributes.action: get Eddie Izzard Knighted for his efforts for Sports Relief
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are very humbled by what Eddie Izzard did for Sport Relief. It would have been a huge achievement for a normal athelete let alone a comedian who has little running experience. We believe he deserves more then thanks and deserves to be honoured for the effort and selflessness he has shown.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
